name: SeattleGarbageCollection
0:
”Alexa, ask trash collector register new data.”
”Alexa, ask trash collector what is today's garbage?”
”Alexa, ask trash collector delete all data.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trash collector
des:
You can register your garbage collection day. And after registration, you can ask TRASH COLLECTOR to your today's garbage. Supported garbage type is "RECYCLE", "FOOD", "GARBAGE" and, "YARD WASTE". Collection day of week is "SUNDAY" to "SATURDAY".

[Registration]

User: "Alexa, start TRASH COLLECTOR."

Skill: "Welcome to the Seattle City Trash Collector. You can REGISTER, DELETE and CHECK the trash collect schedule. To regist, "REGISTER NEW DATA". To delete, "DELETE ALL DATA". To check, "WHAT IS TODAY'S GARBAGE?"

User:"Alexa, ask TRASH COLLECTOR regist new data."

Skill:"Register the garbage type and collect day of week. Garbage type is {RECYCLE | FOOD | GARBAGE | YARD WASTE}."
User: "Garbage type is RECYCLE."

Skill: "I remember collect garbage type is RECYCLE. Next, register the collect day of week, collect day of week is {SUNDAY | MONDAY | TUESDAY | WEDNESDAY | THURSDAY | FRIDAY | SATURDAY}."

User: "Collect day of week is TUESDAY."

Skill: "I remember garbage type is RECYCLE, and collect day of the week is TUESDAY. Registration is finished."


[Check]

User: "Alexa, ask TRASH COLLECTOR what is today's garbage?"

Skill: "RECYCLE."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
